TopicTitle: Infiniglide + Kraken Drive = Infinite Delta-V SSTO?

Articles.Content:
As the title suggests, I'm just wondering whether someone has made a stock infiniglider/kraken drive SSTO that would theoretically have infinte Delta-V.

Thanks for your time.
There have been several through the years. There was one person who made a whole guide on how to make and use a krakken drive.
